Name: Streamers' Secret Life
About the game: Streamers' Secret Life is a sliding jigsaw puzzle with sexy streamers and a relaxing lofi-jazz-chillhop soundtrack. 2 game modes. 6 different sliding puzzles. 20+ relaxing soundtracks. Image Gallery.
